Modules package

Submodules

Modules.bwbot module

class Modules.bwbot.BusinessWorldBot[source]

Bases: object

A conversational bot that scrapes business articles, generates responses, and manages query contexts.

generate_answer(query, retriever)[source]

Generate an answer for the user’s query using retrieved documents.

Parameters:

  • query (str) – User query.

  • retriever – Document retriever instance.

Returns:

Generated answer with source or an error message.

Return type:

str

is_relevant_answer(query, response, threshold=0.7)[source]

Check if the generated response is relevant to the query.

Parameters:

  • query (str) – User query.

  • response (str) – Generated response.

  • threshold (float, optional) – Similarity threshold. Defaults to 0.7.

Returns:

True if relevant, False otherwise.

Return type:

bool

output(query, context='')[source]

Generate a response for the given query and context.

Parameters:

  • query (str) – User query.

  • context (str, optional) – Context text. Defaults to “”.

Returns:

Generated response.

Return type:

str

run()[source]

Main Streamlit application logic for the bot.

scrape_website(url)[source]

Scrape the specified website to extract content and sub-links.

Parameters:

url (str) – The URL of the website to scrape.

Returns:

Scraped text content and list of sub-links.

Return type:

Tuple[Optional[str], List[str]]

summarize_context(context)[source]

Summarize the given context using the BART summarization model.

Parameters:

context (str) – The input text to summarize.

Returns:

Summarized text.

Return type:

str

validate_url(url)[source]

Validate the URL by sending a HEAD request.

Parameters:

url (str) – URL to validate.

Returns:

True if the URL is accessible, False otherwise.

Return type:

bool

Modules.bwbot.main()[source]

Initialize and run the bot.

Module contents

Business World Bot Project Package

This package provides tools for: - Web scraping and chatbot functionality (BusinessWorldBot) - Fine-tuning and training models for question answering - Evaluation metrics for model performance
